"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"Gather all the strength of ARKS for this
one final battle, and bring an end to our
eternal struggle.
The fate of the entire universe depends
on this. Good luck, all of you.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being defeated
All participants defeated simultaneously
Time limit expires"

"All that lives...
All that has ever lived...
All their wishes are gathering here."

"They're becoming a light to purify
the darkness... A Great Light..."

"There is nothing more left to say.
Only that I wish to thank you
for fighting together with us."

"I don't want to see you
disappear. We're all going
home together, got that?!"

"No-one has to be sacrificed this time.
Let's create a new future together...!"
